metadata.title: CVE-2015-0212 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in course/pending.php in Moodlethrough 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.7, 2.7.x before 2.7.4, and 2.8.x before2.8.2 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via a crafted course summary.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
